trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Table".
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含 「 資料表 」。

trans-unit.target: 從列舉值。

trans-unit.source: If patternInterface is , this method returns a pointer; otherwise, this method returns .
trans-unit.target: 如果 patternInterface 是 ，這個方法會傳回指標; 否則這個方法會傳回 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer"></xref>瞭解為互動式，還是做為控制項的邏輯結構，一般使用者[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 在方格中取得資料行的總數。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TableAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 在方格中的資料行總數。

trans-unit.target: 感興趣的資料列的序號。

trans-unit.target: 感興趣的資料行的序數。
